documents.name: Annual Report 2024-25
documents.description: Comprehensive yearly report on the activities and initiatives of the Department of Pharmaceuticals for 2024-25.

documents.name: Annual Report 2023-24
documents.description: Annual review of the Department of Pharmaceuticals' operations and performance for 2023-24.

documents.name: Annual Report 2022-23
documents.description: Report outlining the key programs, policies, and achievements of the Department of Pharmaceuticals for 2022-23.

documents.name: Annual Report 2021-22
documents.description: Summary of major initiatives and sectoral performance of the Department of Pharmaceuticals for 2021-22.

documents.name: Uniform Code for Marketing Practices in Medical Devices (UCMPMD) 2024
documents.description: Code outlining marketing practices standards for medical device manufacturers and marketers.

documents.name: Uniform Code for Pharmaceutical Marketing Practices (UCPMP) 2024
documents.description: Regulates marketing practices within the pharmaceutical sector to ensure ethical promotion.

documents.name: Export Promotion Council for Medical Devices: Establishment Order
documents.description: Order regarding the establishment and objectives of EPC-MD for medical device export promotion.

documents.name: National Medical Device Policy 2023 - Gazette Notification
documents.description: Official policy framework to guide strategic growth and regulation of the medical devices sector.

documents.name: Strategy Document on National Medical Devices Policy, 2023
documents.description: Strategic insights and approaches for implementing the National Medical Devices Policy, 2023.

documents.name: National Policy on Research & Development and Innovation in the Pharma-Med Tech Sector in India
documents.description: Framework supporting R&D and innovation in India's pharma and med-tech sector for industry growth.

documents.name: Study report on Bridging Academia-Industry Gap to achieve Self-reliance
documents.description: Examines strategies to bridge the gap between academia and industry for pharmaceutical self-reliance.

documents.name: Study Report on Impact of the Drug Price Control Order (DPCO) 2013 on the price of Cardiac stents Knee implants and six medical devices on industry and consumers in terms of availability and affordability
documents.description: Assesses the effects of DPCO 2013 on medical device pricing and accessibility for industry and consumers.

documents.name: Study report on An analysis on leveraging the patent cliff, with drug sales worth USD 251 billion going off-patent and to analyses the different drug pricing methodologies particularly w.r.t. these patented drugs going off-patent
documents.description: Analyzes market opportunities and pricing strategies as major drugs go off-patent.

documents.name: Study on Upgrading NIPERs to meet evolving needs of Pharmaceutical business and NIPERs in top 50 in world ranking
documents.description: Evaluates strategies to upgrade NIPERs for global competitiveness and business relevance.

documents.name: Study on CRO Sector in India
documents.description: Provides a detailed analysis of the Contract Research Organization (CRO) market in India.

documents.name: Report on Survey of Pharma Clusters
documents.description: Presents findings from a survey of pharmaceutical industry clusters in India.

documents.name: Report on Survey of Medical Devices Clusters
documents.description: Surveys cluster-based growth in the Indian medical devices sector.

documents.name: Report on Survey for Novel/ Innovative and Cost-effective Technologies for Productoion of APIs
documents.description: Identifies new and cost-effective technologies for API manufacturing in India.

documents.name: Report on Final Boosting of Medical Devices Industry
documents.description: Proposes measures to strengthen and grow the Indian medical devices industry.

documents.name: Report on Assessment of skill requirement of Indian Pharma Industry
documents.description: Analyzes workforce skill requirements in the Indian pharmaceutical industry.

documents.name: Report on Strategy for Leveraging ASEAN FTA and Trade Potential with the Middle East Countries for Pharma Sector in India
documents.description: A strategy report analyzing how India's pharma sector can leverage ASEAN FTA and tap trade opportunities in the Middle East.

documents.name: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) regarding the Promotion of Research and Innovation in Pharma MedTech (PRIP) Scheme
documents.description: Provides clarification on the PRIP Scheme to support research and innovation in pharma and medtech.

documents.name: Department of Pharmaceuticals invites Expression of Interest (EoI) from interested entities under the PRIP scheme
documents.description: EoI invitation from entities under the Promotion of Research and Innovation in Pharma MedTech Scheme.

documents.name: Modification in the guidelines of Production Linked Incentive (PLI) Scheme Bulk Drugs
documents.description: Details amendments in the PLI Scheme for bulk drugs.

documents.name: Uniform Code for Pharmaceutical Marketing Practices (UCPMP) 2024 - reg
documents.description: Code outlining fair and ethical practices for pharmaceutical marketing in 2024.

documents.name: Approach Paper on Draft National Pharmaceuticals Policy 2023 for stakeholder consultation
documents.description: This draft policy outlines proposals and invites stakeholder inputs on the National Pharmaceuticals Policy 2023.

documents.name: Corrigendum under PLI Scheme for Pharmaceuticals
documents.description: Amendment details for the Production Linked Incentive (PLI) Scheme for the pharmaceutical sector.

documents.name: Detailed Demand for Grants (DDG), Demand No. 7 for the year 2023-24
documents.description: Annual financial estimate and allocations for the Department of Pharmaceuticals for 2023-24.

documents.name: Gazette Notification National Medical Device Policy 2023
documents.description: Gazette announces the National Medical Devices Policy 2023 regulating and promoting the medical devices sector.

documents.name: List of Applicants Approved under Production Linked Incentive Scheme for Promoting Domestic Manufacturing of Medical Devices - Dated 25th April, 2023
documents.description: List of approved applicants under the PLI scheme for domestic manufacturing of medical devices.

documents.name: NIPER Research Compendium
documents.description: A compendium summarizing key research outputs and activities from the National Institutes of Pharmaceutical Education & Research.

documents.name: List of Approved Applicants under Production Linked Incentive (PLI) Scheme for Bulk Drug - Dated 22nd March, 2023
documents.description: Approved applicants list for the PLI scheme for bulk drug manufacturing as of March 2023.
